data.title: Front End Engineer
data.description:
• Collaborating with backend engineers and 3rd parties to create highly configurable and cross-platform web experiences.

  • Exploring real-time web applications, immersive sites, and 3D-powered interfaces using WebGL/WebGPU.

  • Implementing browser-level hardware interactions (camera, microphone, audio, screen capture/record).

  • Building design systems and scalable components with product designers, ensuring pixel-perfect quality and branding consistency.

  • Turning large datasets into elegant, interactive data visualizations with unique UI requirements.

  • Strengthening test coverage with Playwright and similar frameworks to ensure robust and reliable web apps.

  • Conducting full product lifecycles, from idea generation to design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.

  • Continuously improving frontend performance to meet world-class standards.

  • Providing input on feasibility, timelines, and trade-offs while working with product and business divisions.

  • Engaging with users and stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into frontend improvements.
